title: Weird freezing for seemingly no reason
body:
For the past month now, I've been getting these weird instances of the game just being devoid of voices. The sound effects are perfectly audible, but i guess the announcer and my champions get their tongues cut out for some reason. Then, after about 5 minutes, the game will freeze for an obscene amount of time. The longest being around 8 minutes. I'm just wondering if anyone else's client does this or if it's just me, and if anyone has a fix for it.

My PC is the limited edition star wars hp pavillion laptop if that helps at all. Thank you.{{champion:112}}

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be hardware or severe driver issues going on that are causing this to happen. We've consolidated a list of common steps for these types of situations in our [Bugsplat & Crashing guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), so I recommend starting your investigation there.

Let me know if those steps resolve the issue or not.
